message.content:
I need to calculate the final depreciation item in the cash flow statement based on the transaction data. This will be the amount shown in the record with type "Depreciation".

Looking at the data, I can see there is a transaction labeled as "Depreciation" on January 1, 2024:

| id | type | date | amount |
|----|------|------|--------|
| Depreciation20240101001 | Depreciation | 2024-01-01 | 45749.47 |

The depreciation amount is clearly shown as 45749.47. This is the only depreciation entry in the data, and it represents the depreciation expense recorded for the period.

Therefore, the final depreciation item in the cash flow statement is 45749.47.

```json
{"solution": {'Depreciation': '45749.47'} }
```
